articles.description: Obama won the best narrator Emmy for his work on the Netflix documentary series, "Our Great National Parks."
articles.content:
Los Angeles — Barack Obama is halfway to an EGOT. 
The former president won an Emmy Award on Saturday to go with his two Grammys.

articles.content:
